attributes.action: make G-CSF treatment available to ALL breast cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy who need it..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: G-CSF drugs help the body to replace infection-fighting blood cells which are depleted by chemotherapy. Without them patients can get very sick and have to be admitted to hospital for intravenous antibiotics, and chemotherapy treatment has to be postponed. Currently availability is a postcode lottery. The costs of in-patient treatment far outweigh the cost of the drugs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
